title: Break out q&a to separate variable
message_prompt: Can you make it so that I can write questions/answers in a list at the top of the file, and then use that list to populate the component.
message_edit:
I will update the `FAQ.js` file to include a list of questions and answers at the top of the file and modify the `FAQModal` component to iterate over this list to display the Q&A pairs.

Steps:
1. Define a list of questions and answers at the top of the file.
2. Modify the `FAQModal` component to map over the list and display each Q&A pair.
diff_edit:
diff --git a/frontend/src/navigation/FAQ.js b/frontend/src/navigation/FAQ.js index b27d209..ba572fd 100644 --- a/frontend/src/navigation/FAQ.js +++ b/frontend/src/navigation/FAQ.js @@ -2,2 +2,6 @@ import { useState } from 'react'; +const faqData = [ + { question: "Filler question text?", answer: "Filler answer text." }, +]; + const FAQModal = ({ onClose }) => ( @@ -29,5 +33,8 @@ const FAQModal = ({ onClose }) => (

Frequently Asked Questions

-

Question: Filler question text?

-

Answer: Filler answer text.

- {/* Add more Q&A pairs here */} + {faqData.map((faq, index) => ( +
+

Question: {faq.question}

+

Answer: {faq.answer}

+
+ ))}
